snippet: Prime Minister Julia Gillard of Australia endorsed a set of immigration reforms on Monday that would increase the number of refugees the country accepts by nearly 50 percent.
abstract: Prime Minister Julia Gillard of Australia endorses a set of immigration reforms that would increase the number of refugees the country accepts by nearly 50 percent.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Julia Gillard of Australia endorsed a set of immigration reforms on Monday that would increase the number of refugees the country accepts by nearly 50 percent.

headline.seo: Australian Prime Minister Supports New Plan on Refugees
headline.main: Premier of Australia Backs Plan on Refugees
headline.print_headline: Premier Of Australia Backs Plan On Refugees
